#labels Featured
= Object Definitions =

*Topic* (dom: !TopicList)
{{{
  title
  start
  end
  color
  bounds: {
    n:
    s:
    e:
    w:
  }
}}}
  
*Event* (dom: does not appear)
{{{
  uid
  start
  end
  color (inherits)
  location [text]
  title
  
  getOverlays()
  show()
  hide()
}}}
  
*Marker* (dom: !LabeledMarker)
{{{
  title (inherits)
  lat
  lng
  blurb
  icon
  
  onOff: label with title and icon
  onOver: showBlurb(), bringTOFront()
  onClick: (showDetailedBlurb())
}}}
   
*Polygon*
{{{
  coords [Array of (lat,lng pairs)
  color (inherits)
  borderColor (computed?)
  title (inherits)
  
  onOff: show polygon
  onOver: showLabel()
}}}
